title: Gumbala Suthuvom Lyrics Gana Stephen
stanzas:
hey gumbala suthuvom
naanga ayyo yammaanu
kaththuvom
yaenda kaththuvom

gumbala suthuvom,naanga
ayyo yammaanu kaththuvom
kaththuriyenu kaeta
unna vaaiyilaye kuthuvom

enga pullinga ellaam
bayangaram
engala paatha
Tamanna mayangi
vilundhirum

aah unmanga
nayanthaaraavum
kooda vilunthurm
ippa puthu nadigai
keerthy suresum
serndhu vilunthurum

gumbala suthuvom,naanga
ayyo yammaanu kaththuvom
yaenda kaththuriyenu kaeta
unna vaaiyilaye kuthuvom

aadu seththa biriyan thaayen
enakitta kadhaya korthaan
ivan train routela
verkadala viththaan
adhu rendu padi
paththaan

natpunaa unma paasanga
panna maatom mosanga
yen nanbana thotta
avan aavaa naasanga

hey ra ra ra
champesthaanu
friendu kooda
kalaaichikinnu
suthinen naanum

hey ra ra ra
champesthaanu
friendu kooda
joliyaa
suthinen naanum

oru chicken rice-a
vaangi vachchipom
one by two ah
prichippom

indha caru kodutha
orey lifenga
en nanban
majaa typenga

naan maamaanu sonnen
enna machchanu sonnaan
naan govindhanu sonnnen
enna gopaalnu sonnan
vaada naidunu sonnen
appadiye poidunu soltaa

maja sojaalaam
localu vartha
vaadaa machchane
aasaiyaa kaiyathaan
korthen

gumbala suthuvom,naanga
ayyo yammaanu kaththuvom
kaththuriyenu kaeta
unna vaaiyilaye kuthuvom

enga pullinga ellaam
bayangaram
engala paatha
Tamanna mayangi
vilundhirum

idhu unmanga
nayanthaaraavum
kooda vilunthurm
ippa puthu nadigai
keerthy suresum
serndhu vilunthurum

gumbala suthuvom,naanga
ayyo yammaanu kaththuvom
kaththuriyenu kaeta
unna vaaiyilaye kuthuvom
kaththuriyenu kaeta
unna thondaiyalaye kuthuvom
kaththuriyenu kaeta
unna tholukkuliye kuthuvom
